author: demiurgos_23
content: regarding EIP-4750 terminating opcode check, it states `List of allowed terminating instructions in EIP-3670 is extended to include RETF and JUMPF. (Note that CALLF and JUMPF, like other instructions with immediates, cannot be truncated.)`  while EIP-3670 removed those checks, so what is the course of action in this case ?

author: chfast
content: This requirement is no longer there. It was missed to remove this sentence.
